EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_The New Digital Economy for Ireland_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 21, 2015 The CHQ Building IFSC Custom House Quay Dublin {{my.Save The Date 2:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming The New Digital Economy Event.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>. AGENDA
8:00 - 8:30 Registration and a Light Breakfast
8:30 - 8:45 Welcome and Intro
8:45 - 9:55 Digital Disruption: The Outlook
9:55 - 10:40 Why Ireland is at the Heart of the New Digital Economy
10:40 - 10:55 Break
10:55 - 11:40 Transformation: Make it Happen
11:40 - 12:20 What Are Enterprises Doing to Embrace the Opportunities Provided by the New Digital Economy?
12:20 - 13:00 Lunch and Networking VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/event/the-new-digital-economy>
